nb.purpose: For å registrere et sammendrag av en enkelt, betydelig helsehendelse, med hensikt å gjøre det tilgjengelig for helsepersonell innenfor et delt helsejournalmiljø.
nb.use: Brukes for å registrere et sammendrag av en enkelt, betydelig helsehendelse eller omsorgsepisode for visning eller utveksling innenfor et delt helsejournalmiljø.
nb.misuse: Brukes ikke til å registrere fullstendige og samtidige detaljer om en helsehendelse, et møte eller en omsorgsepisode i en helsetjenesteyters journal. Bruk COMPOSITION.encounter (og spesialiseringer) for dette formålet.

pt-br.purpose: *To record a summary of a single, significant healthcare event, with the intent of being made available to multiple providers within a shared health record environment. (en)
pt-br.use: Usado para registrar um únivo evento ou episódio significativo no cuidado à saúde para visualização ou troca dentro de um ambiente de compartilhamento de registros de saúde.
pt-br.misuse: Não deve ser usado para registrar detalhes completos e contemporâneos de um evento em saúde, encontro ou episódio de cuidado dentro do registro de cuidado do profissional de saúde. Use COMPOSITION.encounter ( e especializações) para este propósito.

en.purpose: To record a summary of a single, significant healthcare event, with the intent of being made available to multiple providers within a shared health record environment.
en.use: Use to record a summary of a single, significant healthcare event or episode of care for viewing or exchange within a shared health record environment.
en.misuse: Not to be used to record the complete and contemporaneous details of a healthcare event, encounter or episode of care within a care provider's health record. Use COMPOSITION.encounter (and specialisations) for this purpose.

at0000.1.description: Summary record of a single, significant healthcare event, encounter or episode.
Zusammenfassung eines einzelnen, wesentlichen Vorgangs im Gesundheitswesen, eines Kontakts oder einer Behandlungsepisode.
Registro de sumário de um evento, encontro ou episódio significativo no cuidado em saúde.
Sammendrag av en enkelt, betydelig helsehendelse, konsultasjon eller omsorgsepisode.

at0034.1.description: Used to document information about the bed space e.g. bed was placed next to the window or next to the door.
Beschreibung des Bettstellplatzes z.B. Bett stand neben dem Fenster oder neben der Tür.

at0000.1.description: *An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.

*An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

Um instrumento, aparelho, implante, material ou similares para a prestação de cuidados de saúde . Neste contexto, um dispositivo médico inclui uma ampla variedade de dispositivos que atuem através de uma variedade de meios físicos, mecânicos , térmicos ou semelhantes, mas exclui especificamente os dispositivos que atuem através de meios farmacológicos tais como medicamentos, metabólicos ou métodos imunológicos. O escopo é inclusive de dispositivos descartáveis​​, bem como dispositivos duráveis ​​ou permanentes que requerem seguimento, atividades de manutenção ou calibração regular, reconhecendo que cada tipo de dispositivo tem requisitos de registro de dados específicos.

Et instrument, apparat, implantat, materiale, programvare eller lignende som er benyttet i utførelsen av helsetjenester. I denne konteksten er medisinsk utstyr et bredt spekter utstyr med fysiske, mekaniske, termiske, programvaremessige eller tilsvarende virkemåter. Utstyr som har en farmakologisk, metabolsk eller immunologisk virkning ekskluderes spesifikt. 

Arketypen tar høyde for registrering av engangsutstyr samt varig utstyr som krever sporing, vedlikehold eller jevnlig kalibrering, og tar høyde for at hvert enkelt medisinsk utstyr har spesifikke behov for dataregistrering.

Ein Instrument, ein Gerät, ein Implantat, ein Material oder ähnliches, das für die Bereitstellung von Gesundheitsleistungen verwendet wird. In diesem Zusammenhang umfasst ein medizinisches Gerät eine breite Palette von Geräten, die auf verschiedene physikalische, mechanische, thermische oder ähnliche Weise wirken, schließt jedoch insbesondere Geräte aus, die auf medizinischem Wege wirken, wie zum Beispiel pharmakologische, metabolische oder immunologische Methoden. Der Geltungsbereich umfasst
Einweggeräte sowie langlebige oder dauerhafte Geräte, die nachverfolgt,
gewartet oder regelmäßig kalibriert werden müssen, wobei zu berücksichtigen ist, dass für jeden Gerätetyp bestimmte Datenaufzeichnungsanforderungen gelten.

Ett instrument, en apparat, ett implantat, ett material eller liknande, som används vid tillhandahållande av hälso- och sjukvård. 
En medicinteknisk produkt i detta sammanhang inkluderar produkter som verkar ex. genom en mängd olika fysiska, mekaniska eller termiska sätt. I sammanhanget exkluderas specifikt produkter som verkar med medicinska medel såsom farmakologiska, metaboliska eller immunologiska metoder.
Arketypen tar höjd för engångsprodukter och produkter med tillfällig-, kort- och långvarig användning som kräver spårning, underhållsaktiviteter eller regelbunden kalibrering. Arketypen tar också höjd för att varje typ av medicinteknisk produkt har sina egna specifika krav på registrering av uppgifter.

Een instrument, apparaat, implantaat, materiaal of dergelijke dat wordt gebruikt bij het verlenen van gezondheidszorg. In deze context omvat een medisch hulpmiddel een breed scala aan hulpmiddelen die op verschillende fysische, mechanische, thermische of soortgelijke manieren werken, maar sluit specifiek hulpmiddelen uit die op medicinale wijze werken, zoals farmacologische, metabolische of immunologische methoden. De reikwijdte omvat zowel wegwerpapparaten als duurzame of blijvende hulpmiddelen waarvoor tracking, onderhoudsactiviteiten of regelmatige kalibratie nodig zijn, waarbij wordt erkend dat elk type apparaat specifieke vereisten voor gegevensregistratie heeft.

Un instrument, un appareil, un implant, un matériau ou similaire, utilisé dans la prestation de soins de santé. Dans ce contexte, un dispositif médical comprend un large éventail de dispositifs qui agissent par divers moyens physiques, mécaniques, thermiques ou similaires, mais exclut spécifiquement les dispositifs qui agissent par des moyens médicinaux tels que les méthodes pharmacologiques, métaboliques ou immunologiques. Le champ d'application comprend les dispositifs jetables ainsi que les dispositifs durables ou persistants qui nécessitent un suivi, des activités de maintenance ou un étalonnage régulier, en reconnaissant que chaque type de dispositif a des exigences spécifiques en matière d'enregistrement des données.
